description:
Tobey is 20 years old and gay.
"When did you realize you were gay?" we asked him.
"Since I got the Internet," he replied.
He doesn't have a boyfriend. He says he can't find the right guy because he's "too picky."
When asked to describe his perfect guy: "A gay redneck."
I dunno, but maybe California isn't the best place to find one of those!
title: Tobey
